properties.areaDesc: Shelby, AL; Elmore, AL; Talladega, AL; Chilton, AL; Coosa, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 6:03AM CST until February 20 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Coosa River At Childersburg Affecting Chilton...Coosa...Elmore...
Shelby and Talladega Counties.

.Heavy rainfall of 1 to 2 inches has occurred since Tuesday over the
Coosa River basin...and a flood warning is now in effect for the
Coosa River at Childersburg.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Coosa River At Childersburg.
* until Thursday evening...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 5:00 AM Wednesday The stage Was 403.1 feet.
* Flood stage is 402.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 403.4 feet by
this afternoon. The river will fall below flood stage during
Thursday morning.
* Impact...At 402.0 feet...Flooding of low lying areas begins. At 404
feet flooding of some low lying roads in the area begins...and the
yards of some homes near the river become flooded.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Wednesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
